title: Bandhan Bank launches facility to collect GST through online, offline modes
description: Bandhan Bank has introduced a new facility for collecting Goods and Services Tax (GST) from both customers and non-customers. This service can be accessed online through the bank's Retail and Corporate Internet Banking platforms, or offline at any branch using cash, cheque, or demand draft. The initiative aims to enhance ease of business and bring government services closer to the public.
